trends: There have been no other sightings in Oreokastro
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis UFO was spotted by me and a fellow researcher over Oraiokastro's night sky. At that time we were watching through our telescopes when this object appeared from the NE. Surely it was an object and not just a light, as i could perfectly see it's outline. At first it was stationary, then it ascended with a temendous speed. We had the chance to take several photographs of the event. Alexander Giannakos National Director for MUFON Greece
